strings.Value: "Heh, I'd give anything for a mug of hot grog. And for two mugs..."
"No, after two mugs they'd kick me out of the tavern. How come I never learned how to drink at the Academy?"

"It's better not to risk two mugs at camp. – As soon as you relax a little, the monsters are sure to show up. But when we return to the city, we can drop by Elina's tavern. I'll be happy to keep you company!"
